00044 #ifndef PTR_H_
00045 #define PTR_H_
00046 
00047 template <class T>  
00048 class Ptr 
00049 {
00050 public:
00051     Ptr( T* realPointer = 0 );
00052     Ptr( const Ptr& rhs );
00053     ~Ptr();
00054     Ptr& operator=( const Ptr<T>& rhs );
00055     Ptr& operator=( const T*& realPointer );
00056     T* operator->() const;
00057     T& operator*() const;
00058     operator bool() const { return m_realPointer != NULL; }
00059         void ShowCount() const;
00060         
00061 private:
00062         void Init();
00063         T* m_realPointer;
00064 };
00065 
00066 template <class T>
00067 Ptr<T>::Ptr( T* realPointer )
00068 : m_realPointer(realPointer)
00069 {
00070         Init();
00071 }
00072 
00073 template <class T>
00074 Ptr<T>::Ptr( const Ptr& rhs )
00075 : m_realPointer(rhs.m_realPointer)
00076 {
00077         Init();
00078 }
00079 
00080 template <class T>
00081 void Ptr<T>::Init()
00082 {
00083         if( m_realPointer ) m_realPointer->Upcount();
00084         return;
00085 }
00086 
00087 template <class T>
00088 Ptr<T>::~Ptr()
00089 {
00090         if( m_realPointer ) m_realPointer->Downcount(); 
00091 }
00092 
00093 template <class T>
00094 Ptr<T>& Ptr<T>::operator=( const Ptr<T>& rhs )
00095 {
00096         if( m_realPointer != rhs.m_realPointer )
00097         {
00098                 T* oldRealPointer = m_realPointer;
00099                 m_realPointer = rhs.m_realPointer;
00100                 Init();
00101                 if( oldRealPointer ) oldRealPointer->Downcount();
00102         }
00103         return *this;
00104 }
00105 
00106 template <class T>
00107 Ptr<T>& Ptr<T>::operator=( const T*& realPointer )
00108 {
00109         if( m_realPointer != realPointer )
00110         {
00111                 T* oldRealPointer = m_realPointer;
00112                 m_realPointer = realPointer;
00113                 Init();
00114                 if( oldRealPointer ) oldRealPointer->Downcount();
00115         }
00116         return *this;
00117 }
00118 
00119 template <class T>
00120 T* Ptr<T>::operator->() const
00121 {
00122         return m_realPointer;
00123 }
00124 
00125 template <class T>
00126 T& Ptr<T>::operator*() const
00127 {
00128         return *m_realPointer;
00129 }
00130 
00131 template <class T>
00132 void Ptr<T>::ShowCount() const
00133 { 
00134         m_realPointer->PrintCount();
00135 }
00136 
00137 #endif /*PTR_H_*/
